website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking to add a low-maintenance outdoor camera to your home security setup, Toucan could easily fit the bill.
pros: The $199 Toucan outdoor camera connects to the included Smart Socket light bulb adapter via USB so you don't have to bother with batteries or a power cord
It has a very discreet design and a built-in 100-decibel siren for an extra dose of deterrence
cons: Its Smart Socket adapter made the light bulb extend past the bottom of my wall light
The Toucan relies on the light fixture for illumination rather than infrared LEDs, it doesn't work with smart home products from other manufacturers and its motion sensor was too sensitive

customer_reviews.title: I installed these to my post lights at the entrance ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed these to my post lights at the entrance of my drive. It alerts me if any car approach to my house. It also captures license plate of every vehicle approach to my house.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera. Don't hesitate to get or more of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera. Don't hesitate to get or more of these is you can afford it. I am extremely pleased. Almost as good a peanut butter :)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: ... using this for the past several months and I love it. Great design
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for the past several months and I love it. Great design. Easy install. Love to be able to check out who is at the front door before going to answer it. Great price. The only thing I would want is a higher resolution camera. It would be nice if they upgrade the camera in the future if you could just swap out the present unit with the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Packy57

customer_reviews.title: The best camera ever.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It was so simple to install. The video recording is very clear. I recently showed it to a coworker. She was so amazed, she ordered one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My packages are now secured!!
customer_reviews.text: Package shipped very fast and received the product with no issue. It will be my last time having a package sit on my front porch until I will able to make it home and that always makes me nervous. The Toucan actually eases my worries about this. Now I can see when the delivery guy drops off my package and even keep an eye on it throughout the day until I get home. Thumbs up for this!
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and great features!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to setup and awesome features! I love the responsive 2 way communication. It allows me to communicate with my visitors safely with out having to open the door. I love the clarity of the camera. The major plus for me is not having to run extra power wires for this camera. It comes with an adapter that draws power from the porch light. Making the install very easy!
customer_reviews.author: David Lim

customer_reviews.title: If there is a problem with the camera don’t contact them because you won’t get no one to help
customer_reviews.text: Great product if my light would go off.. the light never goes out , stays on from sun up until sundown and the customer serves never answer their phone or call you back after leaving a multiple messages at a times.. not a good company. Someone needs to buy them out on shark tank or something because at this rate they will be out of business real soon!
customer_reviews.author: Katherline  Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and the 2 way communication is ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and the 2 way communication is my favorite function from this camera. Now I can see who is at the door and talk to them if needed. Video quality is good and notifications on the app are fast.
customer_reviews.author: Alex W.

customer_reviews.title: It works quite well!
customer_reviews.text: The camera and motion detection works very well. There was an issue (I thought) with the "icon" on the phone. It showed over 25 events next to the icon, after all the videos were cleared. Seems to be working ok now. I'm quite pleased with it. I've never upgraded that to the level that requires a monthly fee.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Herron

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and great picture quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a camera for my garage in an apartment building. I bought this and ran it with a USB extension cable from inside the garage and put it above the garage door. I didn't need the light bulb adapter that comes with it because the common area is well lit, and the video quality at night is pretty good! The app is simple to use and the device gets the job done well. Im planning to buy another one for the front door.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sucks
customer_reviews.text: No dependability , hassle getting it replaced, bought 4 so far 2 bit the dust, , so up set with customers service, , i smashed the first one. Because of customers service.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.S.

customer_reviews.title: It would be near perfect with a better camera range
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised but the timing seems off. By the time the notice rings on my phone, the person is usually gone. The siren feature works well - my wife wouldn't speak to me all day after I tried it out on her. It would be near perfect with a better camera range. I tried to position the camera several times for a better angle but just get a smaller fisheye than I expected. Overall, glad I bought it. If you want to save or download any videos, you really have to buy the monthly service (I did). Pretty good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Klaus Klinglikker

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to set up, and works fine including the wifi signal that goes thru the door. The motion dector though seems sketchy. It only recorded one time when I was out painting the porch. I didn't call tech support about it because I already decided I need a different camera because I want one connected to a monitor.
customer_reviews.author: william holmes

customer_reviews.title: This camera produces amazingly clear video and crisp audio. ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera produces amazingly clear video and crisp audio. I purchased it because I order a lot of things online and porch bandits are on the rise. It also helps me keep aware of any peculiar behavior my @$%! of a neighbor does in my yard while I am away.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this camera! Super easy to install and use. I will be buying more and my even shut the others (other brands) off I already have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent home or office security option!! Easy to install and I can see who is at my door or even if I want to see what the weather is like at home. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Outdoor Security Camera!
customer_reviews.text: The Toucan has many functions but my favorite one is the ability to sound the alarm. My neighbor has a dog that constantly goes to our front yard but now we have a way to scare them off. Also, the alarm could be useful during the holiday season considering all of the package thieves! Works great.
customer_reviews.author: buynowlee

customer_reviews.title: Toucan Security
customer_reviews.text: Great system for the price. Easy to install and does the job. I would recommend to anyone looking for low cost video camera system.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to instal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to instal. Cmera is ok. But you have to pay $5 per month for service. The free version only stores video for 2 hours
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera works great, smart socket doesn’t work at all. So lightbulb is always on
customer_reviews.text: The smart socket doesn’t work so we have to always leave the lightbulb on. We can’t control it from the app as it says. It is burning through lightbulbs. The motion is good and we can see what we need to see but the smart socket is terrible. We have tried to work with tech support and they continue to tell us to do the same thing we have been doing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Baehman

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Often does not work or recognize someone at the door. U are expected to purchace an additional plan to use many features.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor security camera
customer_reviews.text: Exact match for another that I bought locally. Awesome microphone that picks up everything within a reasonable radius. Syncs with your smart phone and can be downloaded on multiple phones. You have pre-recorded messages you can use, or speak to the person outside your door yourself. Good picture quality as well. I bought this for my son's house after he had some difficulty with an ex-roommate. I plan to buy one for my own front door at some point as well.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Hickman

customer_reviews.title: simple and fast!!
customer_reviews.text: This security camera was super easy to install and works great! Love that fact that I can monitor who comes to my home and I can speak to them without opening the door. Sharp video quality and no lag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Toycollector29

customer_reviews.title: It's been fine I guess sometimes if everyone is using WIFI it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's been fine I guess sometimes if everyone is using WIFI it slow it down. From time to time it goes offline. But most of all I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Boobee901

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Really easy to set up and I like the two way speaker function the most. Now I can ask the delivery guy to drop off the packages or ask them to come back another day if I’m not home.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: The Toucan WIFI Outdoor Security Camera Is a wonderful product. It is compact and easy to install. This is the first time we've ever purchased a security camera and it has brought us peace of mind. I highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy install and set up time picture quality is top notch day and night (See attached) I will be getting more.

customer_reviews.title: Set up was easy. Picture quality was good and it does work ...
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy. Picture quality was good and it does work with Alexa.

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was super quick. System was easy to install and setup
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was super quick. System was easy to install and setup. Camera quality is good and the system notifies you every time someone approaches the area where the camera is located. I highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Used product
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple until it was time to sync the camera. I’m unable to use it. I received an error message that the device is already registered to someone else!

customer_reviews.text: Over half the time people can walk by the camera and nothing gets detected/recorded!

customer_reviews.title: Lots of false alarms
customer_reviews.text: After four months the light will not turn off. Contacted manufacturer and after several E-mails they have decided to replace the unit if I pay the shipping cost. The unit gets a lot of false alarms with nothing at the door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The wire broke while installing had to use a phone ...
customer_reviews.text: The wire broke while installing had to use a phone charger. Otherwise works ok. Light has a hard time connecting at times have to turn off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Candida G.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied With Our Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the security camera. My husband had no problem installing the two fixtures outside. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Carter

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you want home Security for $ 60.00 an year plus equipment !!! Love this invention !!! Toucan Surveillance kit
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I can'tell give 5 stars is no fault of the product but the users & how good your wi-fi connection is !!! I have Hughes Net Gen 4 & an Linksys router & it works 100 % of the time unless an severe Hurricane knocks out the Wi-fi !!! It records when motion is detected & daylight images are beautiful & nighttime good too !!! I'm installing one on front porch tomorrow !!! Neighbors are jealous who don't want to spend the money for an security system !!! No more arguing about their dogs being in my yard !!! It works & records audio & has 911 call & different greetings !!!
customer_reviews.author: MGB 57

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it, 100% it’s something that everyone needs to keep their house secured
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Toucan provided 30 days unlimited downloads and review video footage. After the 30 days, my package will be switched to their standard one. It gives me 2 HOURS of FREE downloads and reviews. It is a bit short, but I guess it is OK, since the app sends me notification right away when someone is near my house. I know they have the subscription plan as an option, so I may get one of those when I travel so that I can always keep an eye on my house. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected in a security camera.
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased the Kona light with security camera. This was installed and is working just great. Next I ordered the Toucan for my front door. Took approx. 10 minutes to install and get it running. I now have ordered two more units for my Sisters home on the lake. This will be installed both front and back doors. I am totally impressed with all phases of the security camera's. They are everything I have expected and more.
customer_reviews.author: Roger N.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea! Software is not ready for prime time.
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this camera since April, now its mid July, and I have to say that the software is just not ready for prime time. I get a notification that somone is at the door but the video spins and spins and wont load. I get a notification that someone is at the door, and a cloud has created a shadow on the wall in my entry way. For now I'll stick with my nest cam.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Want another!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this!! Need more for the back of the house!!

customer_reviews.title: YES but
customer_reviews.text: Clear picture - easy to install but can't get the visor on?
customer_reviews.author: A. Cavalier

customer_reviews.title: CAMERA NOT ALEXA COMPATIBLE, FALSE ADVERTISING!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS FALSE ADVERTISING, THE CAMERA IS IN NO WAY ALEXA COMPATIBLE!!! Only the light socket has the ability to turn the light on and off. Had such potential to have Alexa chime me that someone was at the door and I could respond to them. Alexa DOES NOT even register the camera in its device list. I confirmed this with Toucan tech support before writing the review. Sending back!
customer_reviews.author: PCGUY

customer_reviews.title: they were great, but in the end the product did not ...
customer_reviews.text: The Toucan security system just did not work. I worked with their technical support, they were great, but in the end the product did not work. I had false alerts and missed events, tech support thinks it maybe caused by a bad motion sensor or settings in my WiFi router or in the Toucan it self. Something sold as a security system should work and work perfectly ever time. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up and the picture is clear
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up and the picture is clear. Records video of 2 minutes on motion. Love the live talk feature.
customer_reviews.author: jim bird

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, they don't make it clear that this thing almost require a "premium" plan to make it worthwhile. After a couple of weeks you are required to pay at least 60$/year or you will be limited to the last 2 hours of alerts. Pretty much makes this useless to most people. What happens if something happens and you can't watch your phone in the next 2 hours? I'm in meetings most days...The free plan should include 24 hours of alerts. Unless you plan to buy a membership look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: S. Paquette

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these cameras. I have two of them set up. Super easy to install and set up. Video quality is great. Just make sure you have a good wifi connection. I had to get a wifi extender so that the video streaming would work uninterrupted.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: I wasted a lot of time and $99 on a network ...
customer_reviews.text: It would not connect to the WIFI router. As suggested in tech support, I bought a WIFi network extender. It connected and worked for about 30 minutes. Then for no apparent reason, it lost the connection. It would not reconnect. After trying several suggestions from tech support, it still would not connect. I wasted a lot of time and $99 on a network extender that I don't need. I am returning it and do not want another.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but......
customer_reviews.text: The camera is clear and the concept is great. My only issue with this is the sensitivity seems to be a little off. I'm getting very frequent alerts. Tried to adjust the sensitivity but doesn't seem to help. I had to turn off the alert but that defeats the purpose. Hope they can fix this in their next software update.
customer_reviews.author: May M. Y. Liu

customer_reviews.title: I have 3 of porch light kuna's and got this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of porch light kuna's and got this one for front porch. It is not recording all time yet and working with Customer Service on getting camera replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Live Camera Not Working
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that works is the recording camera.Reason i bought the camera was to have live view.Live view is only grayed out blinks a picture for 3 seconds at the most then partial picture.Reception is not the problem wifi very close to camera
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The light system isn't working as expected. I set up a schedule but the light system wouldn't follow the schedule. I went back and forth with the tech support people over emails for a couple of months. I even added a new wifi range extender. Nothing has helped. This is my 3rd kuna system. The other 2 works fine. Shame that this didn't quite work out. The thing with security systems is - you really can't gamble with it. I don't have a sense of security with this system. It might be just the lights, but who knows.....
customer_reviews.author: Two2Go

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its not perfect due to some glitches at times but I am overall very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HATE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: worst security camera ever!!!! i bought this kind of camera for security reasons, but i hate it!!! i had to basically be there next to the damm thing in order to work. i went out the country and never did i see what was going on, i registered before i left and even then i could not see the video or live shot at all. You will be dissapointed if you buy it too. I'm reviewing the product not the seller ok!!
customer_reviews.author: Angrymrs

customer_reviews.title: Not helpful enough
customer_reviews.text: Wanted really to like it, but don't meet my needs.Was pretty straightforward to set up. But keeps recording video of moving shadows of leaves around all day long , but sometimes stop working and won't record just when a car stops at the gate ! Had to reset twice , one week after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Can't see ANYTHING at night
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Can't see ANYTHING at night and I have a porch light. When Toucan updates this, it will corner the market.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Decent product with easy to setup Has good viewing angle Always almost reliable ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent product with easy to setup Has good viewing angle Always almost reliable with wireless signal Don't like that you need subscription to keep video clips stored for any length of time, once the premium period runs out, the camera will alert you that some is at the door but then it will only keep the clip for short period ( 1-2 hours) then it is gone ! It means that you have to view all alerts right away or you wont know what happened, it kinda does defeat the purpose . I think a minimum of 24 hours should be built in the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Repairman

customer_reviews.title: Guess it would be nice if I actually received what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: WHAT??? SERIOUSLY???? I ordered this as a Christmas gift. I open the box and there are several other items I ordered in there... But the ONLY Toucan item is the Toucan Smart Switch thing for the light bulb!!! NO CAMERA WHAT SO EVER!!! SERIOUSLY GUYS!
customer_reviews.author: BillyBobBooooooJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rather buy a light with camera built in it, this thing gave me headache!!

customer_reviews.title: 2 strikes right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the product today and went to install. There were pieces of the installation accessories missing and when I tried to connect to my wifi it said the unit belonged to another user and would not connect... clearly a returned item. Not a good experience!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: First of all it wasn't working right call for support ...
customer_reviews.text: First of all it wasn't working right call for support took to long almost 2 days to get a response I sent it back for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS HAVE TO RESET CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: Always have to reset camera every day. All my other Wi-Fi camera(s) work fine. This is not a maintenance free camera.
customer_reviews.author: John Olson

customer_reviews.title: Won't work with a light that has a closed sconce ...
customer_reviews.text: Won't work with a light that has a closed sconce. I wish I knew that before i ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Rockford

product_meta.title: TOUCAN WIFI Outdoor Security Camera, Powered By Your Light Fixture, DIY Installation, Works with Alexa
product_meta.description:
Toucan Outdoor Home Security Camera is a preventive surveillance system built to retrofit most existing outdoor light fixtures. With a wide angle, adjustable HD camera, passive infrared motion sensor, a 100dBA remote panic alarm and 2-way communication speaker and microphone, Toucan detects activity at your doors providing automatic notification directly to smartphones via the Kuna mobile App. See and talk to visitors no matter where your are, using live video and captured footage. Toucan patent pending smart socket allows remote light control. It's an easy 3-step installation, no hardwiring or batteries needed – if you can change a light bulb, you can install Toucan.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




Smart Detection and Auto Greeting Receive instant mobile alerts when people are approaching so you can safely take action using your HD live feed, two-way intercom, automatic greeting (chime or message), pre-recorded deterrent messages, 100+ decibel siren, and control your light.

Easy Installation If you can change a light bulb, you can install Toucan. (1) Install the Smart Socket; (2) Connect Camera to Smart Socket via included USB cable; (3) Download and set up the mobile app. Done!




FREE 2-HOUR LOOK BACK See recorded events for up to 2 hours, including 10 seconds of footage before the activity was detected.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED 60-day returns & 1-year warranty.

VIDEO DOWNLOADS 3 event downloads per month for free. More with optional paid premium plans (visit www.getkuna.com).




SMART EVENT DETECTION Many detection-based cameras capture your visitor’s back or only after they have arrived, losing visual evidence of the story. We capture 10 seconds before an event is triggered, so that you see your visitor’s face as they walk in.




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Outdoor Home Security

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

"We would sometimes have unsavory strangers coming around our neighborhood. Most of the time they were harmless, but my wife and I still felt unsafe: opening and answering the door put us at personal risk, but so did ignoring them, because if no one responded they would walk around outside, looking for something to take. Sai-wai has had similar experiences. That's why we created Kuna and licensed it to strategic manufacturing partners. Toucan is powered by Kuna Technology and works with Kuna mobile apps." - Haomiao, Kuna co-founder & CTO

What makes your product special?

Preventive vs reactive: Our unique position outside the home allows you to detect that something bad is about to happen, and react to it. And, in the unfortunate event of something bad happening, it allows you to download and share useful evidence with your local law enforcement.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

Taking something from a simple idea to protect my wife to a reality that will protect thousands of homes around America is exciting, terrifying and energizing all at once. We've worked how to understand our community's security needs and build a product that not only meets these needs but goes above and beyond with extra features that delight and reward the user.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately).
Easy installation. Twist the Smart Socket into your existing light fixture, connect the USB cable from the Smart Socket to the TOUCAN Camera, and pair your smart device with the TOUCAN.
2 Way Communications. Built-in microphone and high-fidelity speaker for clear audio communication.
Control light from smart device app with motion sensor triggering, dusk to dawn scheduling, manual control or voice commands using Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
Receive notifications to your smart device and monitor with 24/7 live video feed or video playback.
Pre-recorded messages for greeting or deterrence such as an automated greeting, a barking dog, and even seasonal holiday messages.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars179 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
